sys_script_include.description: Returns a GlideRecord object of the given board. This can either be a "x_snc_kanban_board_app" record or a "x_snc_kanban_board_user" record.
sys_script_include.name: GetBoardRecord

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_e80d6fa8dbf38a90f0f1d03cd39619e5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_devtools.GetBoardRecord</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Returns a GlideRecord object of the given board.
This can either be a "x_snc_kanban_board_app" record or a "x_snc_kanban_board_user" record. </description><name>GetBoardRecord</name><script><![CDATA[function GetBoardRecord(vBoard)
{
	var GetRecord = x_snc_devtools.GetRecord;
	var IsValidRecord = x_snc_devtools.IsValidRecord;

	var grBoard = GetRecord('x_snc_kanban_board_app',vBoard);
	if (IsValidRecord(grBoard) == true)
	{
		return grBoard;
	}
	grBoard = GetRecord('x_snc_kanban_board_user',vBoard);
	if (IsValidRecord(grBoard) == true)
	{
		return grBoard;
	}
	
	return false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-31 20:59:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>e80d6fa8dbf38a90f0f1d03cd39619e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetBoardRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS" source="x_snc_devtools">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DevTools WORK IN PROGRESS">d689f6901bd38450a89720a8ec4bcbfd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e80d6fa8dbf38a90f0f1d03cd39619e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-31 20:59:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
